insights.root_cause: Fluctuations in transaction timing or errors in data entry.
insights.recommendation: Review transaction logs and correct any discrepancies.

insights.bucket_description: No clear pattern, but deviation exceeds threshold
insights.recommendation: Conduct a detailed audit to identify unusual transactions.

insights.bucket_description: Consistent increase or decrease in outstanding balances
insights.root_cause: Consistent changes in account activities or manual adjustments.
insights.recommendation: Analyze account activities for systematic changes.

insights.root_cause: Manual reversals or corrections in the accounting system.
insights.recommendation: Verify the validity of reversal entries and correct as needed.

insights.bucket_description: Outstanding balances are not in line with previous months
insights.root_cause: Significant changes in business operations or reporting errors.
insights.recommendation: Compare current balances with historical data to identify causes.

insights.bucket_description: Gradual deviation beyond threshold over multiple periods
insights.root_cause: Progressive errors in data entry or reporting.
insights.recommendation: Investigate trends over time to pinpoint gradual discrepancies.

insights.bucket_description: High volatility in account balances over time
insights.recommendation: Stabilize account management practices to reduce volatility.
